abstract: The couple maintained that they abducted their children from foster care because they believed at least one was being abused.
snippet: The couple maintained that they abducted their children from foster care because they believed at least one was being abused.
lead_paragraph: More than two weeks after they were apprehended in Harrisburg, Pa., with their eight children, whom they were accused of abducting from a foster care facility in Queens, the two parents returned to New York on Thursday for their arraignment.

headline.main: Couple, Accused of Abducting Their 8 Children, Are Held on $75,000 Bail
